finalScreen.head1: Kundli GPT - Get Your Detailed Birth Chart
finalScreen.finalDetailed: Before we proceed to unveil your chart and planetary degrees, it's important to highlight the significance of the Kundli, also known as the birth chart. Your Kundli is more than just a collection of symbols—it's a unique map that reflects the cosmic energies present at the time of your birth. It offers valuable insights into your personality, life events, relationships, and spiritual path. As we explore your Kundli together, may it provide you with profound revelations and guidance on your journey of self-discovery and growth.

loveCalculator.head1: How Much Do You Love Your Partner?
loveCalculator.head2: Find out the love between you and them!
loveCalculator.description: How much do you love your partner? Discover your love with our calculator. It compares names using parameters related to love, romance, and relationships for compatibility.

screen1.msg: Check out my love compatibility score!
screen1.shortReview: Your bond is at its strongest peak. This will lead to a healthy relationship in future and a happy life time.
screen1.head: Comprehensive Compatibility Analysis : Love, Sexual, Friendship, and Communication

loveData.love1: You may be experiencing a budding love but lack depth; understanding each other's emotional needs is crucial for growth. Your relationship has potential; investing time and effort can lead to deeper connections.
loveData.love2: Your affection is present but requires nurturing; exploring shared interests and values can deepen the connection. Take the time to understand each other better; your relationship can blossom into something beautiful with patience and understanding.
loveData.love3: Your love flourishes with shared experiences and mutual understanding; you find comfort and joy in each other's presence. Your relationship shows promise; continue to cherish and support each other as you grow together.
loveData.love4: A strong bond forms the foundation of your love; mutual respect and admiration fuel your relationship's growth. Your connection is deep and meaningful; nurture it with love and understanding to create a lasting partnership.
loveData.love5: Your love is profound and enduring; you cherish and support each other through life's journey, creating a deeply fulfilling connection. Your relationship is fantastic; continue to nurture your love and watch it flourish with time.
loveData.sexual1: Your sexual chemistry may need exploration and understanding; open communication can enhance intimacy. Take the time to explore each other's desires and preferences; understanding and openness can lead to a more fulfilling physical connection.
loveData.sexual2: Moderate attraction exists, providing opportunities for growth and exploration in intimacy. Embrace the opportunity to deepen your physical connection; exploring new experiences together can strengthen your bond.
loveData.sexual3: Strong sexual chemistry ignites passion and desire; you enjoy fulfilling experiences together. Your sexual compatibility is a source of joy and excitement; continue to explore and celebrate your intimacy.
loveData.sexual4: Your sexual compatibility is robust, creating a deeply satisfying and harmonious connection. Your physical connection is a testament to your strong bond; continue to prioritize and nurture your intimacy.
loveData.sexual5: Sexual intimacy is profound and fulfilling, enhancing the bond between you on a profound level. Your sexual connection is exceptional; continue to embrace and cherish the depth of intimacy you share.
loveData.communication1: Communication may be challenging for you, requiring patience and effort to understand each other's perspectives. Take the time to listen and empathize with each other; effective communication can strengthen your bond and resolve conflicts.
loveData.communication2: Your conversations may need more depth and understanding; active listening can bridge communication gaps. Engage in meaningful conversations and seek to understand each other's viewpoints; effective communication is key to building a strong relationship foundation.
loveData.communication3: Communication flows smoothly, fostering understanding and empathy between you. Your ability to communicate openly and honestly is a strength; continue to prioritize open dialogue to deepen your connection and resolve conflicts effectively.
loveData.communication4: You communicate effectively, sharing thoughts and feelings with ease and openness. Your communication style promotes understanding and closeness; continue to nurture this aspect of your relationship to maintain a strong emotional connection.
loveData.communication5: Communication is effortless and enriching, deepening the emotional connection and understanding between you. Your ability to communicate is exceptional; cherish and continue to foster this deep emotional connection in your relationship.
loveData.friendship1: Your friendship may need nurturing; building trust and shared experiences can strengthen the bond. Invest time and effort into cultivating your friendship; a strong foundation of friendship can enhance all aspects of your relationship.
loveData.friendship2: A budding friendship exists, providing opportunities for shared activities and deeper connection. Embrace the opportunity to deepen your friendship bond; shared experiences and mutual support can lay the groundwork for a strong and lasting relationship.
loveData.friendship3: Your friendship is solid, characterized by mutual respect, trust, and support. Your friendship is a source of strength and joy; continue to nurture and cherish your bond as you navigate life's ups and downs together.
loveData.friendship4: A strong friendship forms the backbone of your relationship, fostering companionship and loyalty. Your friendship is the cornerstone of your relationship; continue to prioritize and celebrate the bond you share.
loveData.friendship5: Your friendship is exceptional, marked by understanding, laughter, and unwavering support through all life's challenges. Your friendship is a gift; continue to cherish and nurture the special connection you share.
